Docs.summary: The OnParameterChangeListener interface defines a method called by the Equalizer when a parameter value has changed.

remarks.para: The OnParameterChangeListener interface defines a method called by the Equalizer when a parameter value has changed.

Docs.param: the Equalizer on which the interface is registered.
status of the set parameter operation.
ID of the modified parameter. See #PARAM_BAND_LEVEL ...
additional parameter qualifier (e.g the band for band level parameter).
Docs.summary: Method called when a parameter value has changed.

remarks.para: Method called when a parameter value has changed. The method is called only if the parameter was changed by another application having the control of the same Equalizer engine.
